name: Domain of Mastery: Myriad Illusions I
description:
Once a place where the great trained and honed themselves, it is now occupied by base scoundrels.
Should you cleanse this ceremonial site, perhaps you will obtain the revelations left here by the ancestors.
disorder: When a character's Nightsoul points increase or decrease, their CRIT DMG is increased by 60% for 6s.
